title: Mechanism of Shashen Maidong Decoction in the Treatment of Radiation Pneumonitis Based on Network Pharmacology and Molecular Docking.
abstract: Radiation therapy is a crucial method used to treat various tumors, but it can lead to radiation pneumonitis. Shashen Maidong Decoction (SMD) is clinically used to treat radiation pneumonitis, but the exact mechanism remains unclear.
